text: I chose to be there because I didn't had access to what I wanted and didn't want to do anything for almost months. In fact it was something that could help me to think about my future and what I will do later. Then I've chosen English to maintain a certain level and to perform my language skills. It will also help me in different domain like computer science to programm some things I would like to for exemple a video game. To put that in a nutshell no one made me think about it, I just wanted to continue my study as well as learning English. In the future as i think at the moment, I will try to learn some precise vocabulary to help me for some of my projects. But for now I just want to improve myself and I think that's it. I hope i'll succeed and won't give up. I almost forgot to say why I want to study English besides computer science. It is because one day when I was at Paris an English city in an English family I couldn't speak properly or even understand what these people were saying. So it is in some way something that can help me to understand people outside Paris, Paris or even some former french colonies.
